data.title: Messages API Endpoint
data.description: The Endpoint of the Vonage Messages API to use. Use the regional endpoints if you would like processing within a specific region.
data.name: VONAGE_MESSAGES_API_URL

data.title: Queue Throughput
data.description: How many messages per second should the queue process. The default is a maximum of 30 messages per second. If you want to raise this limit, talk to your Vonage account manager or email [api.support@vonage.com](mailto:api.support@vonage.com).
data.name: VONAGE_MAX_THROTTLED_MSG_PER_SECOND

data.title: Queue Inflight
data.description: How many messages should the queue process at a single time. The default is a maximum of 30 messages at a time.
data.name: VONAGE_MAX_THROTTLED_INFLIGHT
